markdownRemark.html:
Name: Christian J.F. Lacdael
Location: East of England.
Email: c.lacdael@widel.uk

Since 2012 I have built up a programming knowledgebase and portfolio. When I am not working with computers, or enjoying being a father and husband, I write and publish poetry: www.poetry.me.uk

Languages:

I regularly use the following programming/scripting languages.

  • Javascript & Reactjs
  • Java
  • Python
  • C embedded

Fullstack Development

  • Using a LAMP stack I created tools to help with business tasks and production management.
  • Using a JAVA, embedded Linux and SQLite I work in lead roles creating two products that have gone to market.
  • Using a LAMP stack and tools to generate static content, I have created multiple personal websites and one company website.

Network Administration

  • Designing and setting up several small company networks.
  • Providing remote and on-site system administration, and using scripting to help monitor servers.
  • Designing and setting up business data backup system.

Linux & Embedded Linux

  • My preferred setup is Debian + i3wm + Ranger file browser.
  • Configuring Linux and services for product deployment.

Embedded Programming

  • Using C for ARM and Microchip embedded programming.
  • Data acquisition with digital signal processing.
  • Designing, modifying, and making several PCBs.

CanBus

  • Substantial knowledge of J11783 and J1939.
  • Writing C for embedded systems.
  • Using Python in an embedded Linux system.
  • Utilization of an OBDII interface.

Mobile Development

  • Using JAVA to create prototype Bluetooth applications.
  • Using the Cordova system with Reactjs to create educational mobile applications, using the handle c.lacdael
